Page.Title: How do I install EUP?
Page.Description:
Emergency Uniforms Pack (EUP) adds high-quality law enforcement, rescue, and civilian uniforms to GTA V. It’s split into several components:
**EUP Law & Order** – The core pack containing standard police uniforms and equipment. **EUP Serve & Rescue** – Adds fire, EMS, and other emergency service outfits (optional, but recommended). **EUP Menu** – Allows you to browse and apply EUP outfits in-game via a user-friendly menu. **EUP Configurations** – Adds outfit presets and configuration files for use with LSPDFR characters.
We recommend installing all 4 components for the best experience.

Page.Title: Installing EUP Law & Order Pack
Page.Description:
1. Download EUP Law & Order: [**EUP Law & Order (LCPDFR)**](https://www.lcpdfr.com/downloads/gta5mods/character/8151-emergency-uniforms-pack-law-order/)
2. Download `EUPLO8.3.rar` (not the LML package) and extract it.
3. Drag the `.OIV` file onto your desktop.
4. Open **OpenIV** → Tools → Package Installer → select the `.OIV` file.
5. When prompted, install to **mods** folder.
6. Finally, drag and drop the `plugins` folder from the archive into your GTAV main directory.

Page.Title: Installing EUP Serve & Rescue Pack
Page.Description:
1. Download EUP Serve & Rescue: [**EUP Serve & Rescue (LCPDFR)**](https://www.lcpdfr.com/downloads/gta5mods/character/16256-emergency-uniforms-pack-serve-rescue/)
2. Download `EUPSR1.4.rar` (not the LML package) and extract it.
3. Drag the `.OIV` file onto your desktop.
4. Open **OpenIV** → Tools → Package Installer → select the `.OIV` file.
5. When prompted, install to **mods** folder.

Page.Title: Installing EUP Menu
Page.Description:
1. Download EUP Menu: [**EUP Menu (LCPDFR)**](https://www.lcpdfr.com/downloads/gta5mods/scripts/13245-eup-menu/)
2. Drag and drop the `plugins` folder into your GTAV main directory.
3. Download [**RAGENativeUI**](https://github.com/alexguirre/RAGENativeUI/releases) and extract it.
4. Drag `RAGENativeUI.dll` into your GTAV main directory.

Page.Title: Installing EUP Configurations
Page.Description:
1. Download the configuration files: [**EUPFR Basic Configurations (LCPDFR)**](https://www.lcpdfr.com/downloads/gta5mods/datafile/22400-eupfr-basic-configurations/)
2. Choose either: - `EUPFR Basic - without addon cars`, or - `EUPFR UE - without car mods` (if using Ultimate Edition).
3. Open the selected folder and locate the `data` folder.
4. Drag and drop the `data` folder into `GTAV/lspdfr`.
5. Replace files if prompted.
